title: varam aruLvAi paramEshanE
sahitya:
varam aruLvAi paramEshanE


anupallavi

  sharaNAmbujat-tEn candanamum uNDun sangIta sAdhanam sheidiDavE


caraNam    ducchamAna ninaivu dUra shenrozhiya tuyar sheyyum varumai tUruDan azhiya
accaminri engum anbu veLLam pozhiya arivum kalaiyum tiruvum poliya
